text: Happy Independence Day to the people of #Chile. Congratulations on 208 years of sovereignty.
Feliz Día de la Independencia al pueblo de #Chile. Felicitaciones por sus 208 años de soberanía.

When it comes to combatting the opioid crisis in America, our records are clear: https://www.tedcruz.org/press-releases/ted-cruz-takes-action-to-combat-opioid-crisis-while-beto-orourke-voted-to-reduce-dea-funding/ #TXSen #KeepTexasRed http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DnYrtbgXgAE3opd.jpg

I support Dr. Blasey Ford’s request for an FBI background investigation before a hearing. She should not be bullied into participating in a biased process and we should not rush forward before facts are gathered.
RT @TeamPelosi Dr. Christine Blasey Ford, we stand with you and your courageous decision to come forward. Republicans in Washington must #PostponeTheVote.

As Jews in America and around the world come together in synagogue for the holiest day of the Jewish year, Yom Kippur, the Day of Atonement, Heidi and I wish all those in observance a meaningful and easy fast. May you be sealed in the Book of Life. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DnYI392XoAEhL4R.jpg
This Yom Kippur, wishing all those who observe, an easy and meaningful fast.

Has N. Korea's Kim won a propaganda coup?  Not yet, but he is working on it. Moon’s standing at home is tied to tensions with North subsiding. He appears willing to break with U.S. on talks & accept a long term step by step process of denuclearization. https://www.apnews.com/23e9b4c6d55044d68cf45e56a104debc https://twitter.com/marcorubio/status/1042086092906946561 QT @marcorubio South Korea’s Moon embraced by Kim in Pyongyang in bid to revive nuclear talks. All designed by #KJU to drive a wedge in the U.S.-S.Korea alliance.  https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/south-koreas-moon-travels-to-pyongyang-in-bid-to-revive-stalled-nuclear-talks/2018/09/17/d5b401fa-ba5c-11e8-b1c5-7a2126bc722c_story.html

RT @philgunson More context for the video of Maduro wolfing steak in Istanbul: here are the figures showing how much less Venezuelans are eating since he took office. Per capita meat consumption down by over a quarter, for instance. by 2017. https://twitter.com/prodavinci/status/1041819197490323456 QT @prodavinci El consumo de carne de res cayó 26,41% de 2012 a 2017 en Venezuela. En el mismo período, el consumo de carne de pollo disminuyó 48,22% de acuerdo a la investigación de los profesores Luis Zambrano Sequín y Santiago Sosa de la UCAB [Gráfico interactivo] https://prodavinci.com/grafico-la-caida-del-consumo-de-alimentos-en-venezuela-2012-2017/

Our nation is a beacon of hope for refugees fleeing terrible conditions with dreams for a better life. What the Trump Administration is doing – systematically crippling the American refugee program – is deeply wrong and un-American to the core. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/09/17/us/politics/trump-refugees-historic-cuts.html

Don’t be fooled. This will be the lowest ceiling for refugee admittance to the United States since the program was created. They are turning away people fleeing persecution and oppression.
